_header: Merry singen the monks binnen Ely
_description: The Canute Song, quoted by Thomas of Ely — two couplets

CamTCC1105.Transcription:
Merie sungen þe muneches binnen elyþa chut ching reu
                    þer byRoweþ chites noer the landand here wve þes
                    muneches saeng
